definitions: in a way that relates to a profession or career

examples.text: professionally successful but emotionally unfulfilled adults

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to a profession or career

definitions: in a manner worthy of or appropriate to a professional person; skillfully

examples.text: the officer acted professionally with great bravery

shortDefinitions: in manner worthy of or appropriate to professional person

definitions: as a person's paid occupation rather than on an amateur basis

examples.text: she has sung professionally with opera companies around the world
they had their hair and make-up done professionally

shortDefinitions: as person's paid occupation rather than on amateur basis
